channel.title: HELP! error while running the server and i dont have compiler [718]
channel.description:
hey all, i dont have a compiler in my source, when i run the "Run.bat" it say:
Error: missing 'server' JVM at 'C:/Program Files/Java/jre7/bin/server/jvm.dll'. please install or use JRE or JDK that contains these missing components. press any key to continue . . .
plz write a comment and help if u can

item.title: HELP! error while running the server and i dont have compiler [718]
item.dc:creator: @challengex challengex
item.description:
@challengex wrote:

:palm: Did you actually read the error? you’re missing the java virtual machine dll, get jdk…

Read full topic
